channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Strong winds forecast for Los Angeles threaten areaâ€™s fight against fires
item.description: A growing force of firefighters and equipment has moved into the Los Angeles area. Another round of powerful winds is threatening to trigger new wildfires and set back recent progress in containing two massive blazes.

item.title: Multiracial boom in 2020 census was mostly an illusion, researchers say
153 winners of Nobel and World Food prizes seek new ways to grow food to meet surging global need
